mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS cnt , login_id , emp_seq , dept_seq , comp_seq FROM NEOS.V_USER_INFO WHERE (login_id = #{id} OR emp_name = #{id}) AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND MAIN_DEPT_YN = 'Y'

SELECT A.popup_login_id, A.reg_title, A.reg_contents, B.confirm_notice_id, B.confirm_login_id, B.confirm_emp_seq, B.confirm_dept_seq, B.confirm_emp_position, B.confirm_emp_duty, B.confirm_yn FROM TPF_CUST.TPF_POPUP_LOGIN A JOIN tpf_cust.tpf_confirm_notice B ON A.popup_login_id = B.popup_login_id AND A.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND A.REG_STATUS = 'RQ02' AND B.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND B.CONFIRM_YN = 'N' AND A.REG_YEAR = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') WHERE B.confirm_login_id = #{login_id} ORDER BY A.WRITE_DATE ASC LIMIT 1

select s.option_id,v.option_value,s.option_d_value from neos.tcmg_optionset s left join neos.tcmg_optionvalue v on s.option_id = v.option_id and (v.co_id = #{compSeq} or v.co_id = 0) where s.module_gb = 'cm'
